# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be even more beneficial in your hands. We're offering this exceptional product to you for $11500. It's a fantastic deal considering its worth of $12000 to you. We're confident you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
